```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data_EDA <- read.csv(file='./data/listings_EDA.csv')
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=data_EDA, aes(neighbourhood_group_cleansed, price)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_log10() +
  xlab("neighborhood") +
  ylab("price") +
  ggtitle("price in different neighborhood")
```
